title: How long do the support team take to answer a ticket?
body: I'm trying to cash in some RP from phone credit, and I get the text asking me to reply with Y to confirm payment, and I do but it never charges me and the RP doesnt come in. I submitted a ticket but my credit expires tomorrow; how long do they take to respond?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Support responses may take 24-48 hours or more depending on the backlog of requests, I assume you've already tried to [contact Boku support](https://boku.zendesk.com/home) (As they're the company that handles mobile payments for RIot)?

If not, I would recommend maybe contacting them as well, as it may be an issue on their end.
